description: Core review-agent rules for Ralph Review Gate (policy-driven, including coding standards)

rules.title: Cross-module boundaries are explicit
rules.check: No undocumented direct coupling between unrelated modules

rules.title: Public contract changes are documented
rules.check: Any API/block/schema contract change has matching docs update

rules.title: Critical paths are covered
rules.check: Gate 3 evidence exists for required test flow

rules.title: Canonical documentation links are used
rules.check: Docs do not point to deprecated/non-canonical internal locations

rules.title: Method and variable naming is domain-consistent
rules.check: No ambiguous naming patterns for non-trivial methods/variables in changed scope

rules.title: Namespace and layer placement is consistent
rules.check: Changed classes are placed in expected namespaces/layers with no boundary drift
